sentences: Delegates received proposed text from a regional group and from a group of industrialized countries, and debated which paragraphs they were to consider.
The Chair proposed discussing paragraphs in a specific order.
The regional group sought to consider the entire article as a whole because of newly proposed text in one subparagraph stating that Parties will adopt P&Ms according to their priority areas.
The regional group's proposal divides the P&Ms into three types; obligatory, intermediate and voluntary.
The Chair of a contact group reported that participants had been unable to agree on revising a paragraph concerning P&Ms in Annex A.
The non-group met again in the evening.
enb_long_title: Seventh Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) Eighth Session of the Ad Hoc Group on the Berlin Mandate
